Control.Name: FillEmpty
Control.Text: Fill Empty Slots with Current Runes

Pixie.Text: Are you sure you want to load this build? It will replace your current planned runes.

To auto-rune your items, you must type your character name in the box below. By typing your character name in the box below, you assume all responsibility for whatever happens to the runes you want to auto-rune.

Control.Text: This "load" is dependent on server lag time.
Control.Name: Info
Info
Control.Tooltip: Unfortunately, this process cannot be 100% automated due to the buttons seen below. There are no script functions that automate the action that these buttons do. Clicking these is a consequence of that, however it's far less clicking than the default UI.

Control.Name: Reroll
Control.Tooltip: This rune slot will require a reroll in order to slot this rune.

Control.Name: Reroll
Control.Tooltip: This rune slot will require a reroll in order to slot this rune.

Control.Name: Craft
Control.Tooltip: Runecrafting window needs to be open

Control.Text: When your direct heals Multi-Hit, gain an Empower for 5s. Empower: Increases Multi-Hit Severity Rating by 248. Stacks 5 Times."
Control.Name: Description
